name: HttpErrorCodes
description: A CodeSystem that identifies the HTTP Error Codes in response to a request.

concept.display: 400: The API was unable to process the request.
concept.definition: The API has given a 400 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 400: The Receiver was unable to process the request.
concept.definition: The Receiver has given a 400 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 400: The Proxy was unable to process the request.
concept.definition: The Proxy has given a 400 response internally to the Senders request.

concept.display: 400: The Server was unable to process the request.
concept.definition: The Server has given a 400 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 401: The API deemed you unauthorized to make this request.
concept.definition: The API has given a 401 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 401: The Receiver deemed you unauthorized to make this request.
concept.definition: The Receiver has given a 401 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 401: The Proxy deemed you unauthorized to make this request.
concept.definition: The Proxy has given a 401 response internally to the Senders request.

concept.display: 401: The Server deemed you unauthorized to make this request.
concept.definition: The Server has given a 401 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 403: Failed to authenticate with the API.
concept.definition: The API has given a 403 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 403: Failed to authenticate with the Receiver.
concept.definition: The Receiver has given a 403 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 403: Failed to authenticate with the Receiver.
concept.definition: The Proxy has given a 403 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 403: Failed to Authenticate with the Server.
concept.definition: The Server has given a 403 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 404: The Proxy was unable to find the specified resource.
concept.definition: The Proxy has given a 404 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 404: The Receiver was unable to find the specified resource.
concept.definition: The Receiver has given a 404 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 404: The Server was unable to find the specified resource.
concept.definition: The Server has given a 404 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 405: This API doesnt allow this method.
concept.definition: The API has given a 405 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 405: The Receiver doesnt allow this method.
concept.definition: The Receiver has given a 405 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 405: The Proxy doesnt allow this method.
concept.definition: The Proxy has given a 405 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 405: This method is not allowed.
concept.definition: The Server has given a 405 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 406: Senders message had an incorrect content type defined for a response.
concept.definition: The API has given a 406 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 406: Message had an incorrect content type defined for a response.
concept.definition: The Server has given a 406 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 406: Senders message had an incorrect content type defined for a response.
concept.definition: The Server has given a 406 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 408: The request timed out to the receiver.
concept.definition: The Receiver has given a 408 resonse to the Senders request

concept.display: 408: The request timed out internally.
concept.definition: The Proxy has given a 408 response internally to the Senders request.

concept.display: 408: The request timed out.
concept.definition: The Server has given a 408 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 409: The API identified a conflict.
concept.definition: The API has given a 409 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 409: The Receiver identified a conflict.
concept.definition: The Receiver has given a 409 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 409: The Proxy identified a conflict.
concept.definition: The Proxy has given a 409 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 409: The Server identified a conflict.
concept.definition: The Server has given a 409 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 415: The request is in an unsupported format.
concept.definition: The Receiver has given a 415 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 415: The request is in an unsupported format.
concept.definition: The Receiver has given a 415 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 422: Message was not malformed but deemed unprocessable by the API.
concept.definition: The API has given a 422 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 422: Message was not malformed but deemed unprocessable by the Receiver.
concept.definition: The Receiver has given a 422 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 422: Message was not malformed but deemed unprocessable by the Proxy.
concept.definition: The Proxy has given a 422 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 422: Message was not malformed but deemed unprocessable by the server.
concept.definition: The Server has given a 422 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 429: Too many requests have been made by this source to the Proxy in a given amount of time.
concept.definition: The Proxy has given a 429 response internally to the Senders request.

concept.display: 429: Too many requests have been made by this source to the API in a given amount of time.
concept.definition: The API has given a 429 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 429: Too many requests have been made by this source in a given amount of time.
concept.definition: The Server has given a 429 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 500: The Receiver has encountered an error processing the request.
concept.definition: The Receiver has given a 500 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 500: The Proxy has encountered an error processing the request.
concept.definition: The Proxy has given a 500 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 500: The Server has encountered an error processing the request.
concept.definition: The Server has given a 500 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 501:The Request was not recognized by the API.
concept.definition: The API has given a 501 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 501: The Request was not recognized by the Receiver.
concept.definition: The Receiver has given a 501 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 501: The Request was not recognized by the Proxy.
concept.definition: The Proxy has given a 501 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 501: The Request was not recognized by the server.
concept.definition: The Server has given a 501 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 503: An internal component is unavailable
concept.definition: The Proxy has given a 503 response internally to the Senders request.

concept.display: 503: The Receiver is currently unavailable.
concept.definition: The Receiver has given a 503 response to the Senders request.

concept.display: 503: The Server is currently unavailable.
concept.definition: The Receiver has given a 503 response to the Senders request.
